marklogic.body:
Bargnani needs to put 40 a night to offset what he gives up defensively....He's ridiculouslh awful defensively....Its actually quite amusing,6 yrs IN and he still makes pedestrian mistakes guarding screens and helping...I cant even remmber how many drives to the bucket i saw where hes standing watching and doing nothing,not even trying to contest......Never win with a centre like that....He doesnt challenge anything at the rim....I saw him switch onto mario chalmers on the perimeter Off his man smh...
Until THAT issue is addressed nothing else really matters...and it was exposed so many times tonight on Heat drives to the basket...Accountability on this does NOT exist,fck that talking point....Casey yanked him after 6 mins..but should have yanked him several times in the 2nd half....fuck those perimeter pull up shots if you dont wanna try on D get his ass outta here....he's embarrasing to watch for a man his size to be that soft,dudes a straight up puss...
